title: Type Design on Horology
content: Dear all, I look for informations on the designers (contemporary or old) which already have worked for watch companies. I know for example that Adrian Frutiger had drawn in 2002 a dial for Ventura Swiss. All information on this subject are welcome. I thank you by advance for your help.
author: Christophe Badani
